channel.title: Covid on Vivien BOGNE
channel.description: Recent content in Covid on Vivien BOGNE

item.title: Project VII: Face mask detector
item.description: Problem statement: This is a project made for our knowledge. Indeed the objective is to learn how to use open CV in order to load images, use a predefine algorithm, infer a model and display. We are building here a face mask detector app. We will do this project using the steps below: Data collection and exploration: Collect or download some images ( with mask and without mask) Data annotation and preparation: Prepare those images for a ML or DL algorithm.
